org.springframework.data.redis.core.index

接口 ConfigurableIndexDefinitionProvider

  • 所有超级接口:
    IndexDefinitionProvider, IndexDefinitionRegistry
    所有已知实现类:

    public interface ConfigurableIndexDefinitionProvider
extends IndexDefinitionProvider, IndexDefinitionRegistry
    IndexDefinitionProvider that allows registering new IndexDefinition via IndexDefinitionRegistry.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.7
